API Reference
=============

This page contains the API reference for the radiosonde-teamxuk package.

.. contents:: Modules
   :local:
   :depth: 2

radiosonde_teamxuk.process_radiosondes
--------------------------------------

Module for processing radiosonde data from EDT format to NCAS-AMOF NetCDF format.

.. automodule:: radiosonde_teamxuk.process_radiosondes
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

radiosonde_teamxuk.generate_quicklooks
--------------------------------------

Module for generating quicklook visualization plots from radiosonde NetCDF files.

.. automodule:: radiosonde_teamxuk.generate_quicklooks
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
